attributes.action: NHS privatisation - let the tax payer vote!
attributes.additional_details:
To all MPs, members of the House of Lords and David Cameron in particular...

The privatisation of the NHS as voted for by the House of Lords is a direct breach of the promises made by our government.

Let the UK tax payer vote on this matter. Allow us to have a say in our healthcare.

Please, we are a civilised country, let us democratically decide the future of our healthcare by putting a vote out to the tax payer.

rejection.details: Please see: Suspend the privatisation of the NHS
